snippet.title: Friday the 13th RPG: A Fan Game - Trailer
snippet.description:
Download free here: https://zbr-mf.itch.io/fri13rpg

Experience the terrifying tales of cursed Crystal Lake through the aesthetics of the infamous 1989 NES game, only this time all worlds collide as characters from each of the first seven films team up to take on the immortal Jason Voorhees.

Features:
-Scenarios from the NES game and the first 7 films
-Old school RPG and Adventure play
-13 playable characters
-NES music remixes by BurstError
-Oodles of secrets 
-24 collectable trading cards
-Relentless reverse difficulty curve
-References up the wazoo
-Pulverizing permadeaths
-Buckets and buckets of blood
